mapper.insert: INSERT INTO store (name, storetype, menu, price, address, phone, opening_time, closing_time, date, mem_id, img, tag) VALUES (#{name},#{storetype}, #{menu},#{price},#{address},#{phone},#{opening_time},#{closing_time},now(),#{mem_id}, #{img}, #{hash})
mapper.select: SELECT St_NO, name, storetype, menu, price, address, phone, opening_time, closing_time, date, mem_id, hit, tag , CASE WHEN INSTR(IMG, ',') = 0 THEN IMG WHEN INSTR(IMG, ',') > 0 THEN SUBSTR(IMG, 1, INSTR(IMG, ',') - 1) END AS img FROM STORE ORDER BY St_NO DESC;
SELECT * FROM STORE ORDER BY St_NO DESC Limit 6;
SELECT img FROM store where img is not null and St_NO = #{St_NO} UNION SELECT img FROM review where img is not null and St_NO = #{St_NO}
